card.title: Overview
card.content:
With the _Additional Information_ table you can ...
- rename stored sequences. - display the sequence of a stored sequence.

guide.title: To obtain more information about a sequence from the list

steps.step: Simply click on it. A table will then appear on the right-hand side.
Select a sequence from the list.
Edit the name in the _Name_ field in the table on the right. (The application automatically saves any changes made.)

guide.title: Display the full sequence of a selected sequence

steps.step: Select a sequence from the list.
Click on the sequence in the right table.
A new dialog window with the complete sequence string will be opened.
